title: Black Right-Pointing Triangle with Double Vertical Bar

verbs: To interrupt or cease one's work or occupation temporarily.
To cease or suspend an action temporarily.
To interrupt, to stop or cease temporarily or periodically; to suspend.
To stop the operation of a program or execution of a command temporarily.
To interrupt execution at a given spot, usually for the purpose of debugging.

description: A play-pause icon, showing a right-pointing triangle (play) next to a double vertical bar (pause).
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the play or pause button emoji is a perfectly symmetrical icon with smooth, rounded corners, showcasing Apple's commitment to clean and intuitive design. The dual nature of the symbol, seamlessly integrated into a single graphic, is rendered with subtle gradients and soft lighting that enhance its tactile feel. This versatile emoji, frequently used on Apple products, represents starting, stopping, or resuming media playback and is a fundamental element of digital interaction.
